rules.comment: Block ALL traffic coming FROM a specific device on your network.
Block ALL traffic going TO a specific external IP (e.g., a known malicious server).
Block ALL ICMP traffic (disables ping for all devices).
Block any outgoing connection to Port 23 (insecure Telnet).
Block any outgoing connection to Port 21 (insecure FTP).
Block traffic going to a specific web server port (e.g., a proxy).
Block a specific device (192.168.1.101) from accessing secure websites (HTTPS on port 443).
Block ALL UDP traffic from a specific device (often used for gaming or streaming).
Log any attempt to connect from your network to an external SSH server (Port 22).
Log all DNS requests (Port 53). Useful for seeing which websites are being looked up.
Log ALL activity from a specific device for monitoring purposes without blocking it.
